import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default function WeatherApp() { const [ready, setReady] = useState(false); const [temperature, setTemperature] = useState(null); function handleResponse(response) { console.log(response.data); setTemperature(response.data.main.temp); setReady(true); } if (ready) { return (

); } else { const apiKey = "51ac8c007be10df8c6279a4b5212951e"; let city = "London"; let apiUrl = `http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${city}&appid=${apiKey}&units=metric`; axios.get(apiUrl).then(handleResponse); return "Loading..."; } }
